name: Speedy Brain
description:
-> here is 2 mode a) Level b) Unlimited

-> a) Level Wise : There are 8 levels and each level have time and score target for next level.
-> Unlimited : Mode Unlocked After 5 Levels Done. There is no restiction of time and scop. you can play till game over

Features
========
-> Sharp your mind
-> Improve your calculation speed
-> Boost up your brain
-> Quick answering
-> Improve focus level
-> rove problem solving abilities
